tweet: I’m pleased Congress finally passed a bipartisan measure to help address the humanitarian & security crisis at our southern border. Read my latest enewsletter to learn more about the emergency funding bill now on its way to @POTUS desk for his signature: https://bit.ly/2KOYYXw

Thanks to the $19.1 billion in disaster assistance recently passed by Congress, North Carolina’s families, farmers & military community will be receiving the critical resources needed for long-term recovery efforts from Hurricane Florence ➡️ https://bit.ly/2ZM7hH1
